title: Biden urges stricter gun control after spate of holiday weekend shootings
description: President Biden called for stricter gun control, saying gun violence is "tearing our communities apart,"

title: Twitter says rate limits were to help thwart bots, 'small percentage' of users currently affected
description: Twitter owner Elon Musk announced the limits on Saturday, saying users would only be permitted to read a certain number of posts per day.

title: El Niño has officially begun. UN says phenomenon likely to threaten lives, break temperature records
description: The warmest year ever recorded, 2016, started off with a powerful El Nino that helped to boost global temperatures.

title: Air travel chaos in Europe could be over — but higher ticket prices are here to stay
description: Last summer's levels of disruption might be "largely behind us," but don't expect ticket prices to drop any time soon.

title: Vietnam bans 'Barbie' movie over South China Sea map
description: Warner Bros' "Barbie" movie has been banned in Vietnam, according to the country's state media.

title: The 2023 movie box office will need a strong second half after an inconsistent first six months
description: While the domestic box office has tallied $4.46 billion in sales through June 30, a nearly 20% increase over the same period in 2022, it still lags behind 2019.

title: Britain is now the only major economy where inflation is still rising
description: Inflation ticked lower in the U.S. Canada, France, Germany, Italy and Japan, the OECD said. Britain, however, was found to be an outlier.

title: China’s Xi says countries share responsibility to promote growth, opposes decoupling
description: Chinese President Xi Jinping said Beijing opposes "decoupling and breaking links," according to a CNBC translation of a Chinese-language state media readout.

title: HDFC Bank director says Indian mega merger won't face 'insurmountable challenges'
description: The merger between India's HDFC Bank and HDFC will provide more opportunities for cross-selling, according to HDFC Bank's non-executive director.

title: What are Gallium and Germanium? China curbs exports of metals critical to chips and other tech
description: China is restricting exports of two metals — germanium and gallium — that are key to manufacture electronics and semiconductors.

title: Hong Kong leader vows to pursue 8 activists 'for life' over alleged national security offences
description: Hong Kong police is offering a reward of $1 million Hong Kong dollars for information leading to the arrest of each activist.

title: Inflation blame game: UK economic woes set government and central bank on a collision course
description: In January, with one eye on a critical general election in 2024, U.K. Prime Minister Rishi Sunak vowed to halve inflation by the end of the year.

title: There's a lot of talk about hydrogen's potential. But transportation costs represent a big challenge
description: "The industry knows how to transport hydrogen ... it's not new, it's just expensive," says Murray Douglas, head of hydrogen research at Wood Mackenzie.

title: Before Apple's Vision Pro hits the shelves, lower-priced rival Xreal claims it's near 200k shipments
description: Less than a year since augmented reality glasses startup Xreal started sales, the Alibaba-backed company claims shipments will soon reach 200,000 units.

title: Australia's central bank leaves its key rate unchanged, says inflation 'passed its peak'
description: Economists polled by Reuters were split ahead of the Reserve Bank of Australia's rate decision — 16 out of 31 respondents predicted a 25 basis point hike and 15 expected it to hold.

title: BYD launches its most direct Tesla competitor yet
description: BYD's Denza brand revealed Monday its new N7 electric SUV comes with features and a price that rival Tesla's Model Y.

title: Mercedes' Toto Wolff shares his tips on leading a superstar team and 2 key values for long-term success
description: Mercedes F1's Toto Wolff said he would rather lose the world championship than forsake values, amongst other leadership tips he shared at Energy Asia.

title: China imposes export curbs on chipmaking metals in tech war with the U.S
description: Beijing's move comes after sweeping U.S. restrictions last October aimed at cutting off exports of key chips and semiconductor tools to China.

title: Canadian West Coast ports negotiation reaches impasse as port owners say 'course change' required
description: A union representing port workers in Western Canada officially began striking Saturday, an action that could have ripple effects reaching beyond the U.S.’s northern neighbor.

title: Meituan’s KeeTa joins Hong Kong's food delivery race — but analysts are skeptical
description: Meituan has launched a sister app in Hong Kong, its first roll-out outside mainland China — but analysts are skeptical it can quickly carve out significant market share.

title: OCBC is looking to Greater China and Southeast Asia for a $2.2 billion boost in revenue
description: The bank sees longer term opportunities in the region, nothing that trade links between China and the ASEAN region has a CAGR of about 13%.
